author: giacomo
msg: Fixed some typos with  a patch from Carsten Ziegler

author: giacomo
msg: Allow pattern be written as "\\." to escape in the sense of regexp. The \\ will be replaced by \ in the RegexpMatcherFactor code.
Also make uri-prefix more failure resistant for sitemap maintainers because upi-refix should always end in a /.
